title: Engagement Enhancement and Student Development Strategy Design for Elementary Mathematics Instruction in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Requires engagement strategies tailored to adult learners' characteristics (time constraints, lack of motivation, etc.)

learning_goals: Can analyze the impact of class participation on student development using structural equation modeling
Can propose strategies to improve elementary learners' math engagement by ≥30% using diverse instructional design approaches

Learners develop one participation-enhancing model applicable to actual classroom settings (grades 3–4) through project-based assessment (4-week cycle) and achieve an average score of 4+ (5-point scale) in peer evaluations and expert reviews
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
